titleStmt.title: The Anabaptists late protestation. Or Their resolution to depart the City of London. Wherein is set forth, the full proceedings of a great number of Anabaptists, at a late conventicle neere Old-street. Together with their severall debates, and consultations at the said meeting, concerning the City of London, and the kingdome of England.

The Anabaptists late protestation. Or Their resolution to depart the City of London. Wherein is set forth, the full proceedings of a great number of Anabaptists, at a late conventicle neere Old-street. Together with their severall debates, and consultations at the said meeting, concerning the City of London, and the kingdome of England.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the happy yeare, when sectaries durst not appear. [1647]

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
